name: CODE 000A
description: You woke up inside a robotics workshop, feeling a bright spark of life! This planet has a thriving art industry - even the bots and droids are painting and drawing! Everyone is creative! The Goddess left you with a most important mission: turn your sensors to the sky, catch the messages of the universe, and transform them into great works of art! "Mankind who can believe in fiction is a wonderful creature!"
